Text.Page:
{@RawItem:206821} is famous for its wondrous purification powers. Why, it's only possible to rely on the village's oasis for our drinking water because there is {@RawItem:206821} at the bottom of that very oasis.

It is an invaluable resource that allows us to sustain life.

If you happen to have some, I will pay you very handsomely for it.

Oh, you got it! Thank you!

People who rely on the oasis water will appreciate you for this, .
If you get me some {@RawItem:206821} to maintain the clear oasis, it would be greatly appreciated.
